sentences.en: ...parents of kids who committed minor infractions.
A violation or infraction, as of a law, a legal obligation, or a promise.
sentences.cn: 破坏,违犯,不履行:破坏或违反一法规 、 法律责任或一誓言.

sentences.en: Aim To study the application of Orem self - care theory to cerebral infraction patients.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨Orem自护理论在脑梗死患者护理中的应用.

sentences.en: An infraction is the least serious offense and generally is punishable by a fine.
sentences.cn: 违反是最轻的犯罪行为,惩罚措施通常是处以罚金.

sentences.en: At last, it put forward some advice for research direction and method to prevent cerebral infraction.
sentences.cn: 最后对脑梗死防治的研究方向与方法提出了建议.

sentences.en: He was criticized for his infraction of the discipline.
sentences.cn: 他因违反纪律而受到了批评。

sentences.en: Juveniles, like adults, can be charged with a felony a misdemeanor, or an infraction.
sentences.cn: 青少年和成年人一样, 被指控为重罪 、 行为不端或违反.

sentences.en: Method We selected 60 cases of cerebral infraction who were testified by CT or MRI.
sentences.cn: 方法本文选择了60例动脉硬化性脑梗死患者并均经CT或MRI证实.

sentences.en: Motorists committing this infraction are heavily fined.
sentences.cn: 触犯此条的司机将受重罚.

sentences.en: Objective : To evaluate the effect and economic cost of thrombolytic therapy in acute cerebral infraction patients.
sentences.cn: 目的: 评价急性脑梗死溶栓治疗与非溶栓治疗的疗效及经济成本.

sentences.en: Objective Investigate the effects of atrial fibrillation on the cerebral infraction prognosis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨房颤对老年脑梗死患者预后的影响.

sentences.en: Parking at the bus stop is illegal. Motorists committing this infraction are heavily fined.
sentences.cn: 在公交站停车是违法的.触犯此条的司机将受重罚.

sentences.en: Therefore, in our case, escape might well be an infraction of military law.
sentences.cn: 所以, 在我们这种情况下, 逃跑就会违反战争法.

sentences.en: When infraction or perisplenitis occurs, however, pain in the region of the spleen may be intense.
sentences.cn: 然而, 若发生梗塞或脾周围炎, 则脾区疼痛可加剧.

trans.tran_cn: （对规则、法律等的）违背，违犯，犯规，违法
trans.tran_en: An infraction of a rule or law is an instance of breaking it
